Uses of Class
dataStorage.Customer

Packages that use Customer
Package
Description
controllers
This package contains all the controller classes for this program.
dataStorage
This package contains all the data stored on memory that was retrieved from the database for fast and easy use.
Main
This package contains the JDBC and Main class, also the start of the program.
utility
This package contains classes that help manage,search, and manipulate data used by other classes in this project.
